short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture full-screen or specific application's screen on any HTTPs domain!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anybiz Screenshare is extension to Anybiz Real Time Communication application.
Anybiz is a Real Time Communication application that enables business website's owners and agents to receive Chat requests from website visitors and respond to visitor from any Android device by text, audio or video chat.
You can chat with customers anywhere and sell more.
